name: Change (itch)
description:
Change is a short-story platformer where you are unwillingly given the power to transform between two conflicting species as you experience the story from both sides and learn that there is always more than meets the eye.

Watch a gameplay video by FellowPlayer on youtube!:
https://youtu.be/6qXmxOhGJio

Trailer:


Features:

  • Transform between two species each with different strengths and weaknesses
  • Combat-free gameplay
  • Hand drawn art and animations

Release Date: November 17th, 2015

Platform: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10.

Price: Free

Recommended System Requirements

Windows XP or higher
Intel Core 2 Duo
1 GB RAM
1280x720 Resolution
DirectX 9.0c Compatible Card


Contact: danny.choi@mediadesign.school.nz
